meanings.definition: To be covered in or filled with hirseled
meanings.sent1: The field was hirseled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The cake was hirseled with sprinkles.
meanings.sent3: She hirseled the room with fairy lights for the party.
meanings.sent4: The sky hirseled with stars on that clear night.
meanings.sent5: The garden was hirseled with butterflies fluttering around.

meanings.sent1: She hirseled the gift with a beautiful ribbon.
meanings.sent2: He hirseled the bookshelf with his favorite books.
meanings.sent3: The chef hirseled the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent4: The artist hirseled the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The gardener hirseled the garden with fresh mulch.

meanings.sent1: The hirseled of the room brought a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The hirseled of the cake made it look irresistible.
meanings.sent3: The hirseled of the stage added to the drama of the play.
meanings.sent4: The hirseled of the painting captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The hirseled of the garden created a peaceful retreat.
